subject: which unit test to write?
msgSnippet: Hello, I have read severals books about Junit. The books explain well how to design a unit testable code and how to use stub and mock BUT I found few
messageBody:
Hello,

I have read severals books about Junit. The books explain well how to design a unit testable code and how to use stub and mock BUT I found few explanations about which unit test should we write.

The only references I found were :
1 : in pragramtic unit testing (summary free here http://media.pragprog.com/titles/utj/StandaloneSummary.pdf )
2 : a essay too simple to break on junit faq and in Junit book.

do you have futher guidance? The question which unit test to do is as important as the question how to do unit test because if we don't do the good unit tests then the ROI will be low (or even negative) and the practice won't last long within the programmers teams.



yours sincerely
lo√Øc midy
